description: Three German Kurds talk to the BBC about the aftermath of the attack and racism in Germany.
title: Germany shooting: 'It was a shock but not a surprise'
title_page: Germany shooting: 'It was a shock but not a surprise' - BBC News
maintext: Every day we have to hear really bad news and we gather and try to help each other, but to have a situation like this where something happened right around the corner - this is just really, really hard for everyone to fathom.
